general_advisory: According to IMD, Bhubaneswar, Thunderstorm with very light rainfall is expected in the coming days. Make necessary arrangements for draining out excess water from crop fields in case of rain & give staking in creeping vegetable crops. Farmers are advised to go for summer ploughing and avoid spraying insecticides due to the heavy wind speed forecasted in the next five days. Regular monitoring of insects and diseases in field and vegetable crops is recommended.

advisory: Instead of manual DSR, farmers are advised to follow mechanized DSR cultivation with appropriate practices.
Arrange good quality seeds of Dhanicha for green manuring crop.
Control mealy bug, scale insect, and other sucking pests by spraying Thiamethoxam@80g/acre.
To control early shot borer in sugarcane, foliar spray Fipronil 5SC@400 ml/acre is advised.
For timely planting of kharif vegetables like Brinjal & Chilli, prepare the nursery bed & treat the seed with (Carboxin+Thiram)@2g/kg of seed.
To control Fruit and shoot borer in Brinjal, Tomato & Okra, spray Neem based pesticide 1500ppm@600ml/acre at initial stages.
